nodes.text: The Star Wars Book of Monsters, Ooze and Slime
The Star Wars Book of Monsters, Ooze and Slime is a children's reference book featuring illustrations by Katie Cook. It was published by Dorling Kindersley on July 20, 2021.
The strangest and yuckiest secrets of the galaxy [sic]
What does the Zillo Beast feast on for breakfast? Does slimy Jabba the Hutt ever have a bath? What are the three yuckiest things he eats?

Take a trip on the wild side and discover the weirdest facts in the Star Wars galaxy! From gross creatures and strange bugs to dangerous deserts and sinister Sith, this icky picture book is the perfect gift for young readers.
When the book was initially solicited in October 2020, it had the subtitle "Be Disgusted by Weird and Wonderful Star Wars Facts!" which was dropped when the final cover was revealed in February 2021.
